name: NanoGrid Technologies, PBC
description: Provider of an online platform intended to offer electrification through software intelligence for electric vehicle owners.The company's platform features centralized intelligence for distributed energy devices through benchmarking, prediction and improved performance, allowing customers to set up their homes to gain cheap, green electricity for their electric vehicle.
one_liner: Provider of an online platform intended to offer electrification through software intelligence for electric vehicle owners.The company's platform features centralized intelligence for distributed energy devices through benchmarking, prediction and improved performance, allowing customers to set up their homes to gain cheap, green electricity for their electric vehicle.
